summary: Two young men who have been raised as brothers look to their soccer skills as a way of getting out of their slum. While a scout is in town, an act of violence threatens to tear them apart.
cast: Eliú Armas|Fernando Moreno|Beto Benites|Gonzalo Cubero|Marcela Girón|Jackson Gutierrez|Vicente Peña|Gabriel Rojas|Alí Rondón
title: Hermano
